question:
Which of the following substances are found in the beach sands of many parts of Kerala?
I. Ilmenite
II. Zircon
III. Sillimanite
IV. Tungsten
Select the correct answer using the codes given below:
Codes:
explanation: Ilmenite, Zirecon and Sillimanite are found in kollam district in Kerala but tungsten is not found in the beach sands of Kerala.
